name: prune
description: A small Chrome extension to help you manage your garden of tabs.

scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:extension
scripts.build:ui: npm run --prefix src/ui build && mkdir -p dist && cp -R src/ui/build/ dist
scripts.zip: zip -r release.zip assets dist favicon.ico service-worker.js manifest.json
scripts.clean: rm -fr dist/ && rm -fr lib && rm -fr release && rm -f release.zip
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip

author: Theodore Brockman
